Text: Oh Lucy! (2014 film):  The short film made its world premiere at the 2014 Cannes Film Festival receiving 2nd place in the Cinéfondation.

4: Short Film Jury Award: International Fiction

--------------------
Text: Oh Lucy! (2014 film):  has since become Academy Qualified by winning the Best International Short Film Award at the 2015 Flickerfest as well as the Short Film Jury Award: International Fiction at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival.
